    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>

            <entry>mato_794</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">De cuadrilátero a paralelogramo</string>
            <string language="en">From a quadrilateral to a parallelogram</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Von einem Viereck zu einem Parallelogramm</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'un quadrilatère à un parallélogramme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">De um quadrilateral a um paralelogramo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Da un quadrilateral ad un parallelogramma</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Από έναν τετράπλευρο σε ένα παραλληλόγραμμο</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">simulación interactiva que permite modificar, moviendo sus vértices, un cuadrilátero y el formado por los puntos medios de sus lados</string>
            <string language="en">interactive simulation which allows the user to modify a quadrilateral (and the quadrilateral formed by the midpoints of the sides) by moving the vertices</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">vértice</string>
            <string language="en">vertex</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">plano</string>
            <string language="en">plane</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geometría</string>
            <string language="en">geometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">punto medio</string>
            <string language="en">midpoint</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">paralelogramo</string>
            <string language="en">parallelogram</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">cuadrilátero</string>
            <string language="en">quadrilateral</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">interaktive Simulation, die erlaubt dem Benutzer,
ein Viereck (und das Viereck gebildet durch die Mittelpunkte der 
Seiten) indem es die Gipfel zu ändern verschiebt</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">simulation interactive qui permet à 
l'utilisateur de modifier un quadrilatère (et le quadrilatère 
constitué par les points médians des côtés) en déplaçant les 
sommets</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">simulação interativa que permite que o usuário
modifique um quadrilateral (e o quadrilateral dado forma pelos pontos 
médios dos lados) movendo os vertices</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">simulazione interattiva che permette che l'utente
modifichi un quadrilateral (ed il quadrilateral costituito dai punti 
mediani dei lati) spostando i vertici</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διαλογική προσομοίωση που επιτρέπει στο χρήστη για να 
τροποποιήσει τετράπλευρο (και έναν τετράπλευρο που διαμορφώνεται 
από τα μεσαία σημεία των πλευρών) με την κίνηση vertices</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gipfel</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Fläche</string>
          </keyword>
